tool_description: Tracks and analyzes email communication effectiveness by monitoring response rates, response times, and engagement patterns to improve future correspondence.

tracking_period_days.description: Number of days to track email performance (7-365)

email_categories.description: Categories of emails to track (e.g., sales, support, follow_up)

recipient_types.description: Types of recipients to analyze: clients, internal, vendors, prospects

metrics_focus.description: Key metrics to analyze: response_rate, response_time, engagement, conversion

minimum_email_count.description: Minimum number of emails needed for meaningful analysis (10-1000)

error_messages: Invalid tracking period: Must be between 7-365 days
No email categories: At least one category must be specified
Too many categories: Maximum 10 email categories supported
Invalid recipient types: Use combinations of [clients, internal, vendors, prospects]
Invalid metrics focus: Use combinations of [response_rate, response_time, engagement, conversion]
Invalid minimum count: Must be between 10-1000 emails for analysis
usage: Specify tracking_period_days and email_categories, optionally customize recipient_types, metrics_focus, and minimum_email_count. The tool analyzes email performance and provides actionable insights.

overall_response_rate.description: Overall email response rate as percentage

improvement_recommendations.description: Specific recommendations to improve email effectiveness

trend_analysis.description: Analysis of performance trends over the tracking period
